Metadata: Managing runoff to protect natural streams: the latest developments on investigation and management of hydromodificati​on in California: proceedings of a special technical workshop.	*
Proceedings of a special technical workshop, Ontario, California, October 2-3, 2005.

This document summarizes the presentations and discussions from a workshop convened to provide an overview of key technical and managerial issues associated with hydromodificati​on, with specific focus on California's climatic setting. The goal of this workshop was to identify key conclusions regarding the mechanisms and causes of hydromodificati​on and to provide managers and decision makers with a list of recommended priorities for future work in terms of both technical and managerial products.
